reviewText:
Even though I am thinking about getting the uncut version of the first and second season, I still want to keep this. I don't plan on getting rid of my Sailor Moon stuff.
This movie is really important to get. And get this one before you get Love conquers all!". If you don't you'll get confused.
First episode:
A monster corrupts Amy's friends and makes them think that Amy cheats on her exams.
Second episode:
A monster makes the kids at Rini's school act evil.
Third episode:
When the scouts travel to the future to help Rini, the Genie of the Timewarp spilts them up in the timewarp that goes to the future.
Fourth episode:
If you're a new Sailor Moon fan, this is just one of the reasons why you should buy this.
Fifth episode:
Since Emerald is jealous of Prince Diamond being obsessed with Sailor Moon, she wants to be the queen and have Prince Diamond rule by her side, but ends up turning into a dragon.

This DVD contains the episodes:
Smarts Payoff- Sailor Mercury is accused of cheating cause of her good grades and then she is set against her friends by the enemy.
Child's Play- Rini finds a friends but the negamoon sets her against her after the battle Rini decides to take the scouts to the future.
Future Shocked- The scouts get lost in the time warp and have to fight to save Rini form danger.
Legend Of The Negamoon- Everyone arrives tot he future and all is revealed to the scouts by Darien's future self. ( Serena and Darien find out Rini is their daughter)
Jealousy's Just Reward- Emerald's jealousy blinds her with power and turns into a powerful dragon bent on destruction.

Anything and everything about this anime royally kicks ...Who would have a bad comment about a group of 'all to the power' girls getting medieval on evil! Nice pun isn't it! I thought so! Check this out, it's well worth the moolah. Aya

I know people will argue but not other season of Sailor Moon is better. Yes I think this season is even better than Moon-S-SuperS-and the last season Stars. All season are great but this has the best story line. S-SuperS-and Stars are all the same except for different bad guys and a different ending. In S-SuperS-and Stars the bad guy is doing the same thing: looking for pure heart crystals, dream mirrors, or star seeds. It's the same thing every episode. Bad guy attacks person their crystal/mirror/or star seed appear and then the bad guy realizes its not the one they are looking for and then Sailor Moon kills them and the next episode is just the same. Don't get me wrong, I love all the seasons but everyone has to admit that is what happens in almost every episode until the end.
Sailor Moon R leaves you with a curious feeling. And even though I'd seen all of the seasons before I saw R I was still liking the mystery of Rini's parents (even though we know who they are). The season just gets great by this tape because the scouts go to the future and many secrets are revealed. One secret is why everyone is still alive 1,000 yrs later. Plus I think one of the episodes is great (probably a lot better in the true uncut japanese version and not like the Pioneer version on DVD that they say is uncut) but I don't think little kids would like it, and they shouldn't since the show in japan was made for teenagers.
Anyway this tape is an awesome tape. You even finally get to meet Sailor Pluto in true form.
in volume 19,20 they both have five episodes insted of the usal four episodes and can you beleive it the same amount of many like in the videos with teh four episodes on it 11.99 dollars.
Why not put them in a box set  from  season  one to the new  series  so people  can buy it
If I try to rewind this tape it makes an awful noise and the only way is to have the video actually playing to rewind it

Sailor Moon R is my favorite season

In the first 13 episode of the season, during the Doom Tree part of the season, I enjoyed the story most of all. I found the relationship, the love square, going on between Serena, Darian, Alan, and Anne to be amazing. I had never seen anything like it before in my life, mostly because I was young when it started. It was probably what made me think Love Triangles and Love Squares where a great idea for writing in my own future.

The second half of the season was great but it had several episodes that I found unappealing because the story line of those episodes was lame. Still, over all, the whole season was amazing, the entire story lines, both of them, for start to end were great. The Crystal Tokyo part of the story was amazing to.

I would suggest that everyone watch this season.
I received an advance copy of this set and it's spectacular and is reasons.  I can tell you having only gotten to see a few episodes of the series total that the show itself is  entertaining.

This is an awesome Sailor Moon Vol. I love the dub of Sailor Moon so much. It's an amazing Show. This edition comes with 5 episodes. The scouts go to the future to try and stop the Black Moon Family from causing more mayhem. Defiantly recommend
This is just the way I remember seeing it on tv, well over 10 years ago. If you are a true Sailor Moon fan this one is a must.

I love sailor moon in its orignal japanese form not the edited version. I like uncut dubs not edits. In America This is a kid show. In Japan its an older teen anime for kids 15+ or 13+. Sailor MoonR is finally availble in japanese with subtiles. I ignore sailor moon dubbed and watch the amazing subtile version. Usagi is the BEST.
